import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({selector:'app-about',templateUrl:'./about.component.html',styleUrls:['./about.component.css']}) export class AboutComponent {}

About Me

I’m a passionate Angular Developer from Gwalior with over 3 years of experience in building dynamic and responsive web applications. I focus on clean architecture, reusable code, and seamless UI/UX.

  • Angular
  • TypeScript
  • JavaScript
  • HTML / CSS
  • Bootstrap
  • Node.js
  • MySQL
